list.Add.description:
LIST [Shared/Menu] Adds an item to a named list

[string] identifier
  The list identifier

[any] item
  The item to add to the list

list.Contains.description:
LIST [Shared/Menu] Returns true if the list contains the value. (as a value - not a key)

[string] list
  List to search through

[any] value
  The value to test

list.Get.description:
LIST [Shared/Menu] Returns a copy of the list stored at identifier

[string] identifier
  The list identifier

list.Set.description:
LIST [Shared/Menu] Sets a specific position in the named list to a value.

[string] identifier
  The list identifier

[any] key
  The key in the list to set

[any] item
  The item to set to the list as key
